Prompt_0002.cn: 吼……你让我很愤怒，所以去死--吧。

chapter_0101.cn: 没想到，在绿魔的基地里会遇到你，这趟我真应该带罗杰斯过来。

chapter_0102.cn: 我也这么想，捏碎你这个生锈的罐头简直易如反掌，毫无成就感可言。

chapter_0103.cn: 你的吹牛皮功夫是在1945年学的吧？

chapter_0104.cn: 不知道等你七零八落地躺到废品站的时候还会不会有现在这样的幽默感！

hero_1050103.cn: okay, okay, I can do this.

hero_1050201.cn: Whoa, am I amazing or what!

hero_1050203.cn: THAT'll teach you a thing or two about responsibility.

hero_1090202.cn: Stand down and think about why you failed, kid.

hero_1090203.cn: Not bad, but you are on the wrong side of the war!

hero_1100101.cn: The doctor will see you now.

hero_1100102.cn: I have little patience to mortals' matter.

hero_1100201.cn: Open your eyes to the universe!

hero_1100203.cn: Let me know if you need a prescription when you wake up.

stage_010101.cn: 没想到，在绿魔的基地里会遇到你，这趟我真应该带罗杰斯过来。

stage_010102.cn: 我也这么想，捏碎你这个生锈的罐头简直易如反掌，毫无成就感可言。

stage_010105.cn: 不知道等你七零八落地躺到废品站的时候还会不会有现在这样的幽默感！

stage_desic1_4110001.cn: 驾机意外坠毁在雨林的美队，发现雨林的边缘竟然就是宇宙空间，恰逢此时又遇到了九头蛇的巡逻兵，击溃了这股部队之后，美队决定深入其中，彻底调查清楚雨林深处的秘密。

stage_desic1_4110002.cn: 一路击退蜂拥而来的九头蛇士兵，美队等人终于在雨林深处找到了潜藏于此的九头蛇秘密基地的入口。

stage_desic1_4110003.cn: 进入基地之后，却发现这个基地小得像个车辆维修厂，没有纵深，视线范围内看到的都是墙，直到美队等人找到了通往地下深处的电梯入口。

stage_desic1_4110004.cn: 急速下降的电梯是个天然的“竞技场”，蜂拥赶来的九头蛇卫兵不断地从各个楼层跳落在电梯平台上，美队们在这个拥挤的空间中坚持到了最后。

stage_desic1_4110005.cn: 基地深处是九头蛇的实验室，躲藏在光怪陆离的实验仪器之间伺机暴起伤人的是一队美队他们从未遭遇过的“士兵”。

stage_desic1_4110006.cn: 阴暗狭窄的地下通道，在无可回避的一场场战斗间歇，美队他们必须搜遍通道两侧的房间，找到通往下一层的钥匙。

stage_desic1_4110007.cn: 近在眼前的红骷髅，一反常态，竟然和美队他们玩起猫捉老鼠的游戏来。无论如何，必须紧跟着他，看看这个重要人物在这个名不见经传的基地里搞什么名堂。

stage_desic1_4110008.cn: 通道尽头出现在众人眼前的竟然是一个巨型的金库大门，看起来红骷髅已经无处可逃，除了他藏在金库中的东西，似乎还有惊喜在等着美队众人。

stage_desic1_4120101.cn: 九头蛇基地的入口，航空港的入口，突破这里就能堵住出口，包围整个九头蛇，让他们无处可逃。

stage_desic1_4120102.cn: 九头蛇基地的入口，航空港的入口，突破这里就能堵住出口，包围整个九头蛇，让他们无处可逃。

stage_desic1_4120103.cn: 九头蛇基地的入口，航空港的入口，突破这里就能堵住出口，包围整个九头蛇，让他们无处可逃。

subtitle_1.cn:
Intels gathered from the Wakanda & Madripoor incidents led the team to a coordinate not far from Manhattan,
where the Helicarrier was ambushed by Hydra destroyers.
The commander's Quinjet managed to fight through, the fortress emerged ahead was like nothing they anticipated...

task10001_1.cn:
COMMANDER,
REPORT TO TRISKILION RIGHT THIS MOMENT,

task10001_2.cn: AND HELP ME UNDERSTAND HOW DID YOU LET MADAME HYDRA GET AWAY A SECOND TIME!

task10001_3.cn:
YIKES.
 BUT ON THE BRIGHT SIDE, COMMANDER,

task10001_4.cn:
I WAS JUST 
INFORMED BY THE R&D BOYS THAT THE UPGRADE IS READY.

task10001_5.cn: SWING BY THE AVENGERS TOWER, I'LL SHOW YOU… IF YOU SURIVIVED DIRECTOR FURY ;P

task10002_1.cn:
SIR, WHAT 
HAPPENED IN MADRIPOOR WAS MORE COMPLICATED THAN WE WERE LET TO BELIEVE, AND THE HAND…

task10002_2.cn: …WAS NOT THE PRIORITY. AND DID YOU AT LEAST MANAGED A GOOD LOOK ON THE TENTICLES?

task10002_3.cn:
YES 
AND I WISHED
I HAD A SOLID BODY JUST SO I CAN WASH MY EYES

task10002_4.cn:
:S 
I'VE BEEN TRACKING BUT THE SIGNAL HAD BEEN FADING IN AND OUT.

task10002_6.cn: SMELLS LIKE A TRAP, 'S ALL I'M SAYING.

task10002_7.cn: WHICH IS WHY I'M LENDING THE ARK TO YOU THIS TIME, JUNIOR. TAKE CARE OF HER FOR ME.

task10003_1.cn:
OKAY,
THE AMPLIFIER IS NOW OPERATIONAL, COMMANDER.

task10003_2.cn: YOU CAN ACCESS IT ANYTIME VIA YOUR ONBOARD INTERFACE.

task10003_3.cn:
THAT SHOULD
BE ALL FOR NOW, COMMANDER, SHALL WE CATCH UP WITH THE DIRECTOR?

task10003_5.cn: I'D LIKE TO MAKE A RECRUITMENT STOP BEFORE FLYING OFF.JUST TO BE SAFE.

task10003_6.cn:
PLEASE SAY 
HOWARD THE DUCK, PLEASE SAY HOWARD THE DUCK!

task10004_1.cn:
GREETINGS, 
HEROES. BUT I'M AFRAID YOU NEED TO MAKE AN APPOINTMENT TO SEE THE DOCTOR.

task10004_4.cn:
I'M JOKING, 
I DO HAVE A SENSE OF HUMOR TOO, YOU KNOW.

task10004_5.cn:
SURE YOU DO. 
JUST LIKE I'M THE SILENT AND MATURE ONE IN THE GROUP.

task10004_6.cn:
CAPTAIN. 
SPIDER-MAN. 
I'VE BEEN EXPECTING YOU.

LEVELS ARE A STAND-ALONG VERTICAL-SLICE TAILORED FOR THIS BUILD ONLY,
